TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IUserControlTypeResolutionService

Docs.summary: Defines the method a class must implement to return a control's type for a specified tag prefix and tag name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Page developers and control authors do not use the IUserControlTypeResolutionService interface. The IUserControlTypeResolutionService interface is implemented by tool developers to return the <xref:System.Type> of a control identified by a tag prefix and tag name.

MemberSignature.Value: public Type GetType (string tagPrefix, string tagName);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Type GetType(string tagPrefix, string tagName) cil managed

Docs.param: The parsed prefix of an ASP.NET tag.
The name of the parsed ASP.NET tag.
Docs.summary: Retrieves a type based on a parsed ASP.NET tag prefix and the name of the tag.
Docs.returns: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type of control the prefix and tag identify.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Designer environments implement this method to provide a way for ASP.NET parsers and designers to resolve user control types at design time.
